| History                 = L.A.N.X. News was a news network that covered the protest at the [[Angeles National Forest]] caused by [[Roxxon Energy Corporation (Earth-616)|Roxxon]]'s intention of building a pipeline to connect their West Coast headquarters with a new deepwater drilling platform off the coast. Their correspondent was [[Ximena Xingtao (Earth-616)|Ximena Xingtao]].{{r|Champions Vol 2 1.MU}}
